subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Steve Letarte is Jeff Gordon’s crew chief, and one of the reasons Gordon has a a 242-point lead over Matt Kenseth in the Nascar Nextel Cup standings.
snippet: Steve Letarte is Jeff Gordon’s crew chief, and one of the reasons Gordon has a a 242-point lead over Matt Kenseth in the Nascar Nextel Cup standings.
